_description: Rhyming introduction to the Ayenbite of Inwyt — nine couplets

BLAru57.Transcription: Þis boc is ywrite uor englissemenþet hi[m] wyte hou hi[m] ssole ham zelue ssriueand maki ham klene me[n] ine Þise liueÞis boc hatte huo þet writAyenbite of inwytAuerst byeþ þe hestes tenþet loki ssolle allemen
BLAru57.Attributed Author: Þis boc is Dan Michelis of Northgate ywrite an englis of his oȝene hand. þet hatte Ayenbyte of inwyt. And is of þe bochouse of Saynt Austines of Canterbery mid þe lettres  C:C: (f. 2)
BLAru57.Attributed Title: þet hatte Ayenbyte of inwyt (f. 2); Þis boc hatte huo þet writ Ayen bite of inwyt (f. 13)
